      • getFolderPath

        public static java.lang.String getFolderPath(java.lang.String folder)
        Gets the absolute Path of the Folder Folder folder.
        Parameters:
        folder - a string contained in the folders Map
        Returns:
        an absolute path to the folder, e.g: /media/user/42/KMS/settings/

      • getFilename

        public static java.lang.String getFilename(java.lang.String message)
        Gets the name of a File (without Extension!) by concatenating the localized message to a formatted timestamp.
        Parameters:
        message - message key out of .properties file for i18n
        Returns:
        localized @param message + well formatted timestamp

      • stateHelper

        public static boolean stateHelper(Kartoffelmarktspiel kms,
                  java.lang.String requestedState)
                           throws InvalidStateChangeException
        Responsible for state setting. Checks if a state change from actual state of @param kms to @param requestedState is valid.
        Parameters:
        kms - giving the running Kartoffelmarktspiel because were in a static class here
        requestedState - the state we want to switch to
        Returns:
        true if state setting done or not necessary.
        Throws:
        InvalidStateChangeException - if State-changing is invalid or State is undefined

        Returns:

        public static java.lang.String getApplicationFolder()
        Returns the path to the Application Folder, which holds the jar
        Returns:

      • createFolders

        public static boolean createFolders()
                             throws CreateFolderFailedException
        Creates folders from folders Map if they aren't existing.
        Returns:
        true if all folders exist/where created false if something went wrong
        Throws:
        CreateFolderFailedException - thrown when the folder could not be created (e.g. no write-rights)

      • checkFolders

        public static boolean checkFolders()
                            throws CreateFolderFailedException
        Checks and, if not yet existing, creates the folder structure
        Returns:
        true if everything created/here now false if not
        Throws:
        CreateFolderFailedException - thrown when the folder could not be created (e.g. no write-rights)

      • getUsers

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getUsers()
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Gets all the users written in settings file.
        Returns:
        users from settings file in a Set<String>
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if file does not exist

      • getNiceDate

        public static java.lang.String getNiceDate()
        Get a well formatted timestamp for adding it to auto saved files
        Returns:
        well formatted timestamp as String

      • getLanguages

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getLanguages()
        Gets all available .properties Files, each of them must define a currentLanguage property, which must be equal to the output of the Locale.getDisplayLanguage() method.
        Returns:
        Map<String, String> where keys are the locales [de, en, ...]
        and values the written name of the locale in its own language
        Note that .properties files must define a currentLocale=__ for that.

      • setToString

        public static java.lang.String setToString(java.util.Set<Contract> contracts)
        Gets the set of contracts and converts it to a string for the javascript flot library
        Parameters:
        contracts - Set of contracts as part of the Kartoffelmarktspiel class
        Returns:
        string holding the contract information

      • mapToString

        public static java.lang.String mapToString(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Amount> distribution)
        Gets a map of distribution and converts it to a string for the javascript flot library
        Parameters:
        distribution - one of the distribution Map as part of the Configuration class
        Returns:
        string holding the distribution information

      • getMinMax

        public static int[] getMinMax(java.util.Set<Contract> contracts,
              java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,Amount> sDistribution,
              java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,Amount> bDistribution)
        gets the minimum and maximum values of the distributions and compares it to the min and max of the contracts set. With these values we can limit the chart on 20% difference to the highest and lowest possible value, if a contract price is much to high or much to low .
        Parameters:
        contracts - Set of contracts as part of the Kartoffelmarktspiel class
        sDistribution - sDistribution Map as part of the Configuration class
        bDistribution - bDistribution Map as part of the Configuration class
        Returns:
        Array holding the min [0] and max [1] price
